title: DEADLINE EXTENDED TO 3 FEBRUARY: CFP Dataverse 2026 Annual Meeting from May 12th–15th, 2026, in Barcelona, Spain
content: The website is now live – https://dcm2026.com/ -, and we have opened the Call for Papers . We invite you to submit your abstract for a presentation or poster on the conference themes by February 3, 2026. Quick links to: – Important Dates and general information: https://dcm2026.com/general- information/ – Conference themes: https://dcm2026.com/ conference-themes/ – Abstract Submission: https://dcm2026.com/call-for- papers/ We look forward to seeing you in Barcelona on May...
creator: Asha

title: Disaster Risk Reduction and Open Data Newsletter: January 2026 Edition
content: The pulse of the planet The explosion of data offers new ways to understand the economy—and change what gets measured, not just how. Digital technologies are redefining how we see and manage the global economy. As Kenneth Cukier writes in Finance & Development , the earth is developing a “digital nervous system” through satellites, sensors, and AI that measure everything from deforestation and traffic to crop yields and emissions. These vast data streams give policymakers and businesses an a...
creator: Asha

title: TOMORROW, 28 JAN! CODATA India National Committee and OT-ViRARe Task Group Event: FAIR and Reproducible Structural Biology
content: The upcoming workshop on “ FAIR and Reproducible Structural Biology: Methods, Workflows, and Assessment, ” brings together scientists, data experts, and policy communities to link AI for Science, FAIR data, reproducibility, and responsible research assessment. Convened under CODATA’s new Open Tools and Visitation Frameworks for Global Research Assessment Reform (OT-ViRARe) Task Group, this workshop is a thematic pre-event to the India AI Impact Summit , aiming to address How AI-drive...
creator: Asha
